channel.title: How do I create a global object?
channel.description: Say if I wanted to put a bankbooth somewhere and make it so people could bank in it, how would I do that?

item.title: How do I create a global object?
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

base?

For delta:

Go client.java

Search for

public void NewObjects() {

Under that youâ€™ll see something like this

makeGlobalObject(2444, 3083, 2213, -1, 10);

Thats what you add when you want to add a object.

makeGlobalObject(OBJECT ID, XPOS, YPOS, -1, 10);

the -1 stands for wich side the object is facing. ( can be like 0, -1, -2, -3. )

Read full topic
item.source: How do I create a global object?
